values.description: Put butterfly is the combination of a bull put spread and a bear put spread. The put butterfly strategy can be long or short.
values.keywords: Put butterfly option strategy, bull put spread, bear put spread, profits from low volatility, profits from a drastic change in underlying price, contracts in the strategy legs, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, strategy payoff, risk of early assignment
